"...I couldn't put the ladies through the stress."

"So you're opting to become a hyena then?" the hyena asked.

"I am," Simba replied, "go on, do your worst."

"Oh believe me, you don't want that," the hyena said, "no, simply becoming a hyena will be punishment enough I think, especially as you don't know the first thing about being one."

Simba's face dropped at the realisation of this fact, but before he could voice words, the vision faded.
-------
Simba awoke with a snort, what a weird dream that had been he thought. Still he couldn't lie here all day, and so he arose to see if Rafiki had a solution to his suddenly increased hunger. That had been his intention anyway, but as soon as he moved he realised something was amiss, and looking down, was horrified to find out why. the first part of his anatomy that came clearly into view was his forelegs, now no longer with golden-furred or powerfully muscled, but instead, dappled grey, and rather spindly. Further afield, he no longer had a thick mane nor a long, golden leonine body, but instead a rather shorter, hunch-backed frame with scruffy, dappled grey-brown fur. So the dream had been more than a dream after all he thought, as he stared in a mix of horror, disgust and fascination.

Suddenly he caught sight of movement, and turned to see with just enough time to see and feel the lump of wood fall painfully on his shoulder. Yelping he arose and turned to face Rafiki, "what, what are you doing."

"Getting rid of some rubbish," the mandrill replied threateningly, brandishing his staff again, go on, get out of here you filthy beast."

Simba stood dumbfounded for a moment, but then a whisper in his head said he doesn't recognise you, to him you are now but another hyena. This only increased his confusion, surely his old friends should recog- No, evidently not he realised as he just barely dodged a second blow. Still, he was loathe to leave until a third blow was struck, only glancing this time, but still leaving a painful bruise. That was the last straw for the new hyena, and with just a moments more hesitation, he took off.

After some time, Simba slowed down and stopped atop a small rise, giving him a good view back over the Pridelands, his former home.

This is your home no longer, beast came a voice suddenly in his head, in fact, it now never was except when Scar was king.

Are you going to torture me for the rest of my life, Simba thought savagely.

Now now, no need to take that tone with me, the voice said, And yes I will be with you for the rest of your life, if only to see you have a life beyond a few days.

And what's that supposed to mean, Simba though coolly.

You are ill-trained in the ways of the hyena, the voice replied, I can help you with that, but I will only help you if you're willing to accept my help.

Simba thought this over hard. On the one hand, it made perfect sense, he was utterly ignorant in how to be a hyena, but on the other hand, the though of living with this voice forever was unappealing at best. Finally, he decided to...
1113121122222222.title: Hated Form

1113122.content:
...He was forced to lie back in defeat, no, his stomach - bloated with nearly twice what it should have been able to hold - was simply to big and painfully tight for him to get up, which meant staying here, immobile, until it digested. This thought wasn't particularly worrying at first, for few things would dare to try to attack him, even if he were in such a state, and those few that would didn't usually come to the desert border. Soon though, another threat made itself known, and this one couldn't be fought off with teeth and claws. As he lay there in the blazing sun, the king felt himself getting hotter and hotter. It wasn't bad at first, merely feeling warm, but soon became uncomfortable, persuading him to try again to get up. Unfortunately, this attempt was even less successful, thanks to the sun having made him feel weak and dizzy, and so he could do little but lay back and take it, awaiting his ultimate fate...
-------
It was well after dark when Simba came to, having finally cooled down. His time in the sun had left its mark though, for his mouth was painfully dry from panting, and he was still feeling quite weak. Fortunately, as he looked down he noted his stomach looked very much smaller, perhaps small enough to allow him to get up. He managed to do so, though after a few false starts, as his ordeal had left him weak and slightly dizzy, and immediately cast around for a water-hole, for right now a drink was his most pressing need, even more so that trying to find out why, and even how he'd managed to clean an impala carcass. Fortunately he knew of one nearby, not big, but enough for his needs.

Of course, wanting to get a drink and actually getting one proved to be quite different, as Simba soon found out that weak legs and a dizzy sense of balance made for a slow journey thanks to having to pick himself up repeatedly after various stumbles. Finally though, he was able to reach the waterhole, but instead of simply trying to drink from it, actually walked into it, letting his weak frame sink into the cool water even as he gulped the liquid down his parched throat.

As with his hunger with the impala, so Simba's thirst with the waterhole seemed to know no bonds as he gulped greedily, not content to simply drink his fill, he simply swallowed mouthful after mouthful until his stomach reached its natural limit, and then beyond. By the time he finished drinking, the king's stomach was almost as bloated as, or perhaps even more so than it had been with the impala, which with his weakened legs, made leaving the waterhole impossible, and so he lay there the night, weak body and bloated stomach cradled gently in a liquid embrace.
-------
The next morning, Simba awoke to find...
1113122.title: Out and Alone

112.content: Kovu's life since coming into the pride has been pretty lazy. there hasn't been much to do so he's been laying arround almost all the time.
112.title: Kovu

1121.content:
Kovu groaned lowly as he lay back against the rock, welcoming its shade on his back and head, the sun, was, in his opinion, too hot to be out in in full. His attempts to get comfortable were not made any easier by the slightly larger than was really comfortable weight in his stomach, he'd really have to try to curb his appetite. Curb it even further anyway, he was already eating a lot less now after a moon here than he had in the first days after the reunification. Back then, it was only a little better than even odds that he wouldn't end any meal with stomach cramps. He'd not alone in suffering like that either, he knew, just about every one of the former Outlanders had had at least one painful lesson in the perils of gluttony.

Kovu didn't have much time to get comfortable though as very soon princess Kiara extracted herself from the melee that was the feast on a by now rather denuded wildebeest carcass, and came and lay beside him, then lent against him, which was just a bit to close for comfort, "oof, not so heavy on my haunch, hey."

Kiara smiled as she looked up at him, "still making a glutton of ourselves are we?"

"Well, maybe I did eat a bit more than I should have," Kovu admitted, a touch begrudgingly, still finding it hard to overcome what had once been a survival skill, "but I'm getting better."

"Yes you are," Kiara replied, then added, "and more comfortable."

"More comfortable," Kovu asked curiously, "what d'you mean by that?"

"Well you're no longer skin and bone are you," Kiara asked, "or hadn't you noticed?"

"Oh I'd noticed," Kovu said quickly, though it was only half true. He'd noticed that he didn't bruise up so easily these days, and nor did he feel too achy after lying on hard rock, but he hadn't really known why, until now, "are you saying I'm getting fat?"

"Hardly," Kiara chuffed, "you were half-starved before, now you're looking properly healthy, like a prince of royal blood, instead of some dirty old rogue."

"Thanks," Kovu said, the lowered his head to whisper in her ear, "but need I remind you, that prince though I am, it's your blood that's royal?"

"And aren't you glad it is," Kiara whispered back.

"Oh yes I am," Kovu whispered, "I'm so very very glad." Then his mind came back to his current situation, "now, could you shift off just a little, please?"

"Certainly I could," Kiara smiled cheekily.

Kovu sighed, but happily, Kiara did so enjoy teasing him, "would you please lie a bit less heavily on my haunch Kiara?"

"At once sire," Kiara said, and moved to shuffle her lower half around so as not to be resting so much on her love's stomach. At the same Time, Kovu moved to extricate his foreleg from underneath the princess, which her then rested across her chest, startling a tiny gasp from her.

"Something the matter," Kovu asked, concerned.

"No, no it just took me by surprise," Kiara replied, then deciding she like the sensation of being embraced in such a way, moved her shoulders back hard into his chest, "it feels nice though, so keep it up."

"Glad to be of service," Kovu replied, tightening his grip.
-------
As time flowed by, Kovu grew more and more used to the slow rhythm of the Pridelands lifestyle. As more moons rolled slowly by...
1121.title: Laid Back Lifestyle

11211.content:
...He continued to eat heartily, lowering his intake somewhat, but still perhaps not to quite the level he should have given the significant reduction in the amount of exercise he was now doing. He was hardly sedentary of course, as well as beginning to learn from Simba of the duties of a king, he spend as much time as he could helping Kiara to refine her hunting strategies, but these weren't quite rigorous enough to deal with the number of calories he was still taking in.

Kovu was hardly aware of the fact that though the increase in his girth had slowed somewhat, it was still happening, there always seemed to be some distraction or crisis taking up most of his waking moments. Despite his own ignorance though, the changes didn't go unnoticed, indeed there was hardly a lioness in the pride who wasn't by now aware of the prince's gains, though not quite all of them yet had realised that though many of the former Outlanders had put on healthy volumes of flesh themselves in the moons since the reunification of the pride, none had gained quite as much comparatively as the prince had, the tuck up behind his ribs was now virtually non-existent.

There was some debate over these developments. Some of the lionesses (mostly former Outlanders) felt that the prince's gain was unbecoming, and only verified their own thoughts that though Zira had been wrong about the Pridelanders', that they were lazy and fat. Many of the others though, felt that Kovu's gain was not only quite acceptable, but indeed desirable, making him look more regal and less roguish. There were a few others still that found that their opinions lay somewhere between the two groups, happy to accept that Kovu did indeed look like a proper royal lion now, but that things were starting to go a bit too far. For all the debate though, none of them ever mentioned it to the young, dark lion, at least directly.
-------
"Enjoying yourselves there, lovebirds," Vitani asked, as she approached the rock ledge, not far from Pride Rock where Kiara and Kovu were basking, happily alone until now.

"Yes we were in fact," Kovu said, "what's up?"

"Does anything have to be up for me to come and visit my brother and his mate," Vitani asked.

"No," Kovu said, "but it's the only time you ever do come to see me."

There was a moments' silence, then Vitani asked, slightly irritably, "you haven't seen Kipaku or Chekua around at all have you?"

"No," Kovu replied, "why, they've gone missing again?"

"Yes," Vitani replied, through clenched teeth, "I know some of the others are okay with their not turning up to hunts very often, but I can't stand that sort of thing, as I'm sure you well know."

Kovu nodded, "I'm quite aware of your, dedication Vitani," Kovu said, a slight smile playing across his lips, "you've never quite figured out how to relax and let time pass by have you?"

Vitani frown, "let time go by, you mean, waste time, deliberately?"

"Quite," Kovu said, "and if I see either of those two around I'll let them know you're not happy with them."

"Thanks," Vitani said, "well I'm off then."

"Well good luck then," Kovu said, "I hope you enjoy yourself out there."

"Oh don't worry, I'll enjoy it bro'," Vitani said, "as much as you enjoy the results."

Kovu was to surprised for a moment to make a reply, and by the time he'd got his thoughts together, Vitani had gone. Puzzled, he turned to Kiara, "did that make any sense to you, I think she was taunting me, but I can't figure out why."

"Oh I'm sure it was nothing," Kiara said breezily, "just forget it."

"Okay, sure," Kovu said, and tried to force it to the back of his mind, but it kept threatening to spring back, and so to distract himself, he asked, "so what do you want to do?"

"Hmm," Kiara said, "wha-oh, um, why don't we..."
11211.title: Slow March

choices: ...Vitani, if he could catch her alone
112111.content:
"...Wander down to the waterhole, I'm feeling a bit thirsty."

"Sure," Kovu said, slightly surprised, this was an unusually conservative request from Kiara, she generally seemed to like to live life to the fullest. Not that he was complaining either way though, oh certainly she seemed to enjoy a life of adventure, but he did sometimes worry that she might one day try something even she couldn't handle. He didn't dare express his concerns though, instead saying, "let's go then shall we?"
-------
Despite his attempts to put his sister's words out of his mind, they never quite went away, and as confusing as they had been at first, after some time of nibbling away at it, the meaning seemed, at least to be him, to be quite clear, Vitani considered him a glutton. This wouldn't have been so bad in itself, but his sister was far from the only former Outlander, and if she thought that, how many of the others did? Well he wouldn't be able to find that out now until after the hunt was over, but he would find out...

"Is something the matter love," Kiara asked, noting that Kovu seemed unusually preoccupied.

"I was just thinking back to what Vitani said..." Kovu replied.

"Why," Kiara asked, "we both know she's just jealous right?"

"Yeah, but I don't think she said that just because she was jealous," Kovu said uncertainly.

"So why did she say it then," Kiara asked, her tone a little more sharp than Kovu was used to hearing from her, leading him to wonder if the princess too didn't sometimes get a bit jealous.

"I think she was trying to tell me, something," Kovu replied, still a little uncertain of the exact point himself, "something about my eating, or maybe my weight-"

"Like she's a good one to talk," Kiara replied tartly. Yes, definitely a bit of jealousy there Kovu thought.

"Well I have put on quite a bit since I first arrived-" Kovu began.

"Kovu, you were practically starving when you first arrived," Kiara replied assuredly, "everything you've put on since is just healthy flesh."

"If you say so," Kovu said, still not quite certain.

"Oh I do, I do," Kiara said, "and I've a mind to tell that sister of your to butt out of your life once and for all, stick to her hunting and leave your welfare to me." If he'd been at all uncertain about her jealousy before, Kovu thought, that last statement put it too rest.

"I guess you're right," Kovu said, eager to quell Kiara's feelings, "I guess there are a few bits of my past I still need to leave behind."

"I'd say so," Kiara said, "but come on, this is all depressing stuff and we're supposed to be enjoying ourselves here, not arguing."
-------
"Enjoy yourselves out there lovebirds," Nala asked, when Kovu and Kiara finally returned to Pride Rock.

"We certainly did," Kiara replied happily, then sniffed, "smells like lunch is up."

"It is," Nala replied, "it's zebra today."

"Ah, so we're due a good big feed then," Kiara smiled, "come on Kovu."

"Wha-oh, right," Kovu said, and followed Kiara towards the carcasses, trying to judge, as the lionesses pulled away, which ones were being willingly submissive, and which were only submitting because it was expected of them. He stopped worrying about it though, as the smell of blood suddenly hit him, causing his stomach to churn eagerly, that was a problem that could wait for later, right now his lunch outweighed virtually everything else.
-------
Belching quietly as he lay back, Kovu watched as the lionesses began to tuck into the zebras, now that he'd had his fill. Slightly more than his fill actually he thought, his belly just a little uncomfortable with his large meal, bring back to the fore of his mind, his sister's recent comments. Shifting his belly a little to try and find a slightly more comfortable position, he decided he needed to get the business sorted out once and for all. The problem - one of them anyway - was that Kiara seemed either not to notice how much weight he'd put on, or to actually like it, so he'd have to find a way to get away from her for a bit.

Kovu tossed ideas around in his head, before finally deciding that the best person to ask would be...

11513.content:
Scar burped slightly as he sat back, finally allowing the lionesses to get at the by now somewhat denuded carcass. This was a new sensation for him, being able to gorge to his heart's content, previously he'd always regulated his meals for fear of how his brother would react if he took too much, but now the paler lion was dead - a satisfied smile brief crossed his face - he could do whatever he wanted to. The king frowned though, as he examined himself, for all that the meal had been satisfying, the appearance of his nearly overburdened stomach contrasted badly with his almost gaunt frame. Still, that was a temporary issue, enough meals like this one and his frame would fill out, giving him the appearance of a proper king, not a half-starved rogue.

Of course, a slender physique wasn't the only thing left over from his his so recently cast-off time as a near outcast, he'd also retained something of an anti-social streak. This meant that while he was prepared to tolerate the lionesses' company for the sake of a meal, now that he'd eaten he'd prefer to be alone with his thoughts, and so he stood up - wincing very slightly as his overfull stomach twinged at the sudden shift - and began to make his way down Pride Rock into the savannah.

Sarabi was the first to realise Scar was moving, and so swallowed quickly, and asked, "where are you going sire?"

"Not that it's any business of yours Sarabi," Scar replied, a touch coolly, "but I wish to be alone for a while, farewell."

For a moment Sarabi thought of protesting, but then decided against it, quickly realising that the friendship they'd once shared had died long before. Instead she contented herself with watching his retreating form, noting with a little distaste how his engorged belly swung pendulously with each step, overfull on a kill he'd contributed nothing to, and had not even thanked them for.

Ignorant of Sarabi's scrutinising gaze, Scar continued on his way, pausing a moment at the bottom of Pride Rock, trying to decide where would be the best place to lie up to let his large meal digest. In the end, he decided to head for...

13511.content:
Everything about Simba sickened Scar. Watching every animal in the pridelands cheer for him, as if he was the king already… it was enough to make him sick! Here Scar was, having already proven that he’d be a more than capable ruler… and yet everybody is heralding some stupid cub as the heir to the throne. When he heard that Mufasa would be having a son, he feared just this situation… but he didn’t know it would be this bad! Simba was spoiled rotten, insolent, and didn’t even seem to recognize the gravity of the throne…

Scar definitely needed this problem out of his mane. For the good of the Pridelands! If this little brat is allowed to take power, he shudders to think what will become of this kingdom. No doubt the hyenas would move in and conquer the place! And then the whole food chain would be reversed… throwing everything out of its natural order! But speaking of the food chain, it seems there’s been quite a new worldview being assumed on the ol’ “circle of life”...

Some time ago, the Pridelands was stumbled upon by an unidentified young lion. This was obviously quite scandalous, as any male lion outside of Mufasa’s own family would be a threat to his power. So, he took the lion off somewhere private… and curious, Scar couldn’t help but eavesdrop, only to be shocked by what he witnessed! Mufasa simply swallowed the cub whole! Wrapped his jaws around him and disappeared him in a single gulp, leaving only the most modest, squirming bulge in that fluffy belly…

The bastard! It was too genius, he was almost impressed with his brother. A perfect way to ensure that his authority would remain intact, while also easily boosting his own frame, making him heavier and more capable in battle, all while leaving in no evidence. The more he pondered this, the more he realized just what a great strategy it was. But his thoughts grew even more devious, once he realized he could do even better…!

Okay, well, his first plan, just eating the hyenas, failed miserably. But now he has an even better plan! One that will knock out a few of his problems at once. See, he’s been stockpiling half of each of his daily meals somewhere safe… which, sadly, has been causing him to lose weight slowly, but it was a worthy investment. For soon, he had a massive surplus of meat stored away in a cave somewhere, just ready to be chowed upon…

“Are you sure about this, Uncle Scar?” A curious Simba asked Scar as the much larger lion led him far into the most remote regions of the Pridelands. Like many his age, Simba had been longing to just grow up immediately and skip the whole younger years, and Scar had promised he knew a secret to doing just that.

“I’m as sure about this as I am sure that the sun rises,” Scar chuckled, trying to speak in a soothing tone, patting the cub on the head. “This will make you as big and strong as your father in no time at all. Just you wait!” Eventually, Scar moved a rock that was hiding his secret cave… and when he entered, Simba was immediately in awe! A massive pile of meat of all sorts, delicious in every way, was stored here!

“Whooa! That’s a long of food…!” Simba blinked, completely stunned. “Am I supposed to eat all this?”

Scar pat him on the back, gesturing him forward. “Well, of course! After all, when I was your age, I had to eat seven elephants in order to get as large as I am today!” Simba seemed uncertain… but when Scar took a slab of nice giraffe meat, Simba just licked his lips cutely! “Listen, why don’t we start off small? Maybe some nice giraffe?” Scar snuggled him close, feeding him the steak by paw, letting him take big chunks of it happily until it was all gone.

“Delicious, hmm?” Scar asked, patting Simba’s belly, and Simba, indeed, nodded enthusiastically! Before that meal had any time to settle, though, Scar was already bringing more meat to his lips!“Now that we’ve whet your appetite, care to go for some cassowary…?” Simba was hesitant about eating again so soon, but Scar seemed pretty insistent, so Simba hesitantly chomped it down.

And thus was the pattern of the whole experience. Scar holding Simba close and feeding him all sorts of things, bringing something new up to his lips the moment he finished off his last, always encouraging him to eat faster. The food was really delicious… but it was getting to be a lil much! Especially when his stomach started to grow big and round, bulging out with all the food he was eating and pressing against the ground, straining to keep it all in! “Huff, huf… I-I don’t know if I can eat all this…” He pants, his belly churning and glorping with every movement. “I - uuuurrppp - I already feel so full…”

“Nonsense! We can’t have a future king be defeated by some roasted snacks, can we?” Scar chuckles, interrupting Simba’s complaining by shoving some ostrich meat in that maw! “There’s plenty of room, I assure you. Trust me, stomachs are roomier than you realize…” He laughed at his own bit of dark humor, and from then on, made sure that Simba was getting so much food sliding down his gullet he had no time to talk.

Eventually, all of Simba’s features were starting to look more than a little rounded, as that belly gurgled and churned incredibly quickly! Soon, it was like Simba was hardly recognizable after the relentless meal! His cheeks were now all rounded and soft, his neck was nowhere to be seen, and Scar could curiously knead that huge, round tummy, which was now bigger than Simba’s entire body used to be, back when he was skinnier.

His rump, too, had grown incredibly pudgy, with layered of softness adorning those two big, round cheeks. At the sight of all that pudge, Scar couldn’t help but lick his lips, unnoticed. “Oh my…” He didn’t think he’d ever say this, but… Simba was genuinely looking like the most delicious snack in the pridelands! With every pound Simba gains, he was looking less like a political lion, and more like a big, nice, filling meal!

“Scaarr…” Simba complained, using the extra time while Scar was distracted to pant out some more words. “I’m… so stuffed… I can’t eat… another bite…”

“Oh, you simply can’t stop now! You’ll ruin the whole process! You want to be king, right?” Scar chuckled, leaning forward and wrapping his arms around his back, if only to knead that huge, round, sloshing tummy with his paws. “We can’t leave until you finish your whole meal. Now, please… why not enjoy some nice zebra?”

Simba huffed, unsure anymore. “I’m not… getting strong… just… really fat…”

In response, Scar just shoved more food into his gullet! “Mm, sure, you might be on the softer side for a while…” He reassured him. “But when it all… metabolizes… you’ll be as strong and sizeable as your heart desires. Patience is a vital attribute for a ruler, I must remind you.” Almost too fat to move, Simba could just lie there as he was stuffed further and further, getting pudgier and pudgier with every gurgle...

1451.content:
A new brat in line. Another obstacle! This kingdom was to be his and now some tiny little thing was to stand between him and his majesty?

But with his brute of a brother so big standing between the two of them, there was no way he could ascend to his deserved might.

Wherever the two were off to now, a hunting lesson most likely, Scar stood on the edge of pride rock and surveyed the domain. He wanted it, he wanted to master it all and rule with strength over every inch of it.

He needed a way to be stronger than his brother, and his faster brain eventually settled on a way it might be possible. That mad old monkey Rafiki, his poultices and potions, he'd have a way to increase his strength.

Slinking through the high grass and across the savanna like the rolling shadow of a thin cloud, Scar made his way to Rafiki's tree, but the blasted ape had gone.

Scar felt his nimbleness useful for a moment, only a lion as small and agile as him would've been able to leap-claw-leap his way to the bough where Rafiki kept his stock. Perhaps that was the point, and perhaps he was the loophole.

So many different colored fruits and berries, leaves and barks, hung from string from branches and danced in stone-cups around him. Scar did some mental calculations, counting out different ingredients with a single black claw, and eventually shrugged his shoulders and drank from every available formulation.

It made him feel heavy, especially in his stomach as they all sloshed together, but he felt confident that just as the ancestors and the land magic of Africa had put him in this position, so too would a communion with all the gifts of the earth would bring him to his fate.

His walk back to Pride Rock grew harder and harder, and eventually, he laid out, breathing heavy at the base of the rock. When he felt his body shiver and shake and start to grow...
1451.title: Scar

14512.content:
He felt the power well up in him, such power, and he was greedy for all of it. First his chest would grow in a heave that made him moan, and then it spread to his paws which would stretch out.

In heaving spurts he stretched and swelled, laying there on his back he looked at one paw then the other and saw them growing. He felt the back of his head scrape along the ground as his feet retreated away from him.

Each time his breathing seemed to get deeper, and his moaning possessing the rich timbre of his larger chest.

He rolled over onto his front and slowly lifted his massive head to look down on the world around him, still growing, until he could just see over the top of Pride Rock.

He could feel the fear, the tremble in all the animals who could see him, and they felt like crashing waves of pleasure into his heart. He gently ran a claw along the top of Pride Rock and scanned around, in a slow, long, powerful gaze.

His smile grew, wider, fangs bared each larger than a lion, and he laughed, a booming cackle that shook the ground, building up into an epic earth-rattling roar.

He was going to have some fun.

choices: Hide and wait until the crowd disperses
1512.content:
Simba always wondered what lied beyond the borders of his realm. As he took his first steps through the brush, it didn't look very special. Though there is an oddly well paved dirt path. Before he could take another step forward, something sharp hits him in the neck! He looks around and hears something approach but at the same time he also feels unusually drowsy and finds his eyelids growing heavy. The last thing he sees before passing out are several shadowy figures surrounding him.

After that, the next week ends up being absolute hell. Stuffed into a wooden cube, Simba is unable to break free of his prison and unable to determine where he is. He can feel his container being occasionally moved which happens to knock him around several times. After the first day he submits and chooses to rest until his captors finally free him. The only way he could pass the time was to listen to whatever was going on outside and wait for the creatures to bring him slabs of meat that tasted like nothing he has eaten before.

The worst part might have been the stench. On the hottest of days, Simba's golden fur would be slick with sweat and he'd be lying in a puddle of his own perspiration. His B.O. worked over time and with few air holes the mighty king found himself being hotboxxed by his own odors. By the third day he managed to grow accustomed to his aroma, though his captors couldn't say the same.

At the end of the week, the lion is finally freed from his prison. His captors poke and prod at him forcing Simba to his feet and out of the crate into a dark room with oddly polished, hardened floors. A strange leather bound object is strapped to his mouth and rope slipped around his neck. The creatures remind him of Rafiki with their bipedal movement but with far less hair and being much taller.

They approach a bright entrance much like the mouth to a cave but with iron bars. One of the captors does something and manages to part the bars before shoving Simba out into the open. The sunlight disorients the great king long enough for the creatures to remove his bindings and return where they came from, sealing him outside. As his eyes adjust, Simba gazes at his unusual surroundings.

Surrounded by large stone walls, he appears to be in some sort of enclosure with flaura similar to his kingdom yet something feels off. Theres a small watering hole that garners his attention. He rushes over and laps up as much water as he can get. The refreshing liquid quenches his thirst but then he hears series of clicks. Looking up, he notices more of the bipedal creatures gazing down at him. They come in different sizes and shapes wearing covering their bodies in strange cloth.

"Hey! You up there! Where am I? What is this place?" Simba calls out to his audience. They respond with a roar of chattering and cheering, to Simba's confusion. Some even fling objects at Simba, to which he tries to avoid at first. Then he notices that they aren't rocks, which he thought at first, but strange items in clear that have a peculiar smell to them. He tentatively licks what looks like a shiny stick but not only is it soft, it's the sweetest delicacy he's ever tasted. He scarfs down sugary stick and lers out a small burp. The creatures cheer on but he ignores them, seeing as they won't give him an answer.

Now that he has some food and water in him, Simba considers his options and what he should do. He could explore his new surroundings and try to escape, or he could try and obtain more food from his suspicious audience. Or perhaps he should find a place to hide until the creatures leave.
1512.title: Is captured by humans and put on display at a zoo

1552.content: How does he end up as a complete fat slob?
1552.title: Mufasa

15522.content:
"Urgh... I never should have taken that bet..." Mufasa groans as he stumbles back into the pridelands. One of the lionesses had recently dared him to try and hunt an elephant... and not only that, but to devour the entire thing in an entire sitting! Sure enough, he managed to eat it all, but it had taken and entire day... and he felt completely different afterwards! He went from being slim and muscular to being huge and fat, with a massive, round gut that sloshed beneath him as he walked and dragged against the ground. He had to wait for all that meat to digest a bit before he could even move again, and all that digestion had just caused him to be extremely gassy. He let out a big urrrrrppppp as he walked back towards the Pride Lands.

He shuddered when he heard Simba trotting up to him, assuming the little lion cub would laugh at him. Instead, though, Simba's eyes opened up wide, and he smiled in awe! "Whoa! Dad, you're... humongous!" Suddenly, the little cub hopped onto his back, and Mufasa realized he was exciting exploring all those fat rolls on the big lion's body! "That's so cool!"

"Oh?" Mufasa asked. "I... had assumed you'd just be amused by my... size."

"No way! This is totally awesome!" Simba smiled, snuggling up with those flabby, sweaty rolls. "How did you even get this big? Did you eat a whole elephant?"

He nodded, sheepishly. "Y-yes, actually..."

"Really?" Simba smiled.

"My, that's very impressive~" Suddenly, a more sultry, feminine voice emerged from deeper in the little den! Mufasa's wife, Sarabi, trotted happily down towards him, a desirous look on her face. Mufasa blushed, realizing... did she really like his fatness? "Goodness, I've never seen you this big, dear! It's a... lovely sight, I must admit~" She smiled, moving up and nuzzling his flabby neck.

When suddenly... a huge brraaapppp filled the cave, as a massive fart exploded from his butt! Mufasa was blushing more than ever... but Simba just laughed, and poked those two, big, fat, round cheeks of Mufasa's now huge, gassy butt! "Whoa! That was the biggest fart ever!"

"Mm~" Meanwhile, Sarabi seemed to enjoy the stench, giving Mufasa a kick on the cheek. "I think I could get used to this~"

It seemed both Simba and Sarabi wanted to play with all his flab... but who'd go first?
15522.title: Flabby Father!

1553.content:
"BhHrRoRP-!!! Umpf~... O-Oh... wow! I really should've settled down in this place a LONNNG time ago~!" Exclaims the lazy drongo bird, laying quite peacefully on his back after goring himself in the middle of the bug-infested rainforest. Indeed, this was quite the life. No more stealing, or scavenging, or tricking other animals... Heck, there wasn't even any need to intimate the voices of other animals to get what he wanted! -save for the odd, lazy singing that happened every so often.

He'd pretty much been living life like this for a single week or so, and one thing was for sure, it really was starting to take a toll on his waistline. Not that the drongo minded, of course~. If anything, having a belly that bulged outwards like this as he laid down just... oooh~... made things so much comfier.

*PhHHRRT-!!!* Moaning, Tamaa merely giggles as his sudden, but foul, display of flatulence. Another great feature of this rainforest... no one around to complain about the smell- let alone manners...

I wonder what turn in life this lazy drongo shall take next?
